Description:modify short cut key throw exception
 Build date: M5a, IBM JRE 5.0GA
 OS: WindowsXP Japanese sp2        
Steps to recreate problem:
        1- open Preferences > General > Keys, double click "Content Assist" to Modify
        2- At Key Sequence group - Name Field, delete the default by Backspce key
            
 Result:
I got Unhandled event loop exception, and following stack.
